channel.title: Comments on: Dobos Torte – Daring Bakers Challenge August 2009

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/dobos-torte-daring-bakers-challenge-august-2009/comment-page-1/#comment-3816">Lilie</a>.
Hi Lilie I haven't seen Dobos Torta anywhere around Sydney. Sorry I can't help! Cheers Anita
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lilie.

Hi Lilie
I haven’t seen Dobos Torta anywhere around Sydney. Sorry I can’t help!
Cheers
Anita

item.title: By: Lilie
item.dc:creator: Lilie
item.description:
Hi Guys,
Is there anywhere where I can buy a Dobosh Torta for a birthday party?
Cheers
item.content:encoded:
Hi Guys,

Is there anywhere where I can buy a Dobosh Torta for a birthday party?

Cheers

item.title: By: Marion Gauzer
item.dc:creator: Marion Gauzer
item.description: Just use white sugar for the caramel--no liquid. Cook on high heat in a heavy pan until it turns light amber. You just have to watch that it doesn't burn, otherwise it's easy. My sister was having the same problem and asked me to show her. I think I learned this way from our Mom who was Hungarian.
item.content:encoded: Just use white sugar for the caramel–no liquid. Cook on high heat in a heavy pan until it turns light amber. You just have to watch that it doesn’t burn, otherwise it’s easy. My sister was having the same problem and asked me to show her. I think I learned this way from our Mom who was Hungarian.

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: Anita great job on the hazelnuts! The cake/torte looks great. I, like you, prefer a toffee/caramel recipe where there is a temperature set to help you gauge the right end point, takes the guessing out of the game.
item.content:encoded: Anita great job on the hazelnuts! The cake/torte looks great. I, like you, prefer a toffee/caramel recipe where there is a temperature set to help you gauge the right end point, takes the guessing out of the game.

item.title: By: Y
item.dc:creator: Y
item.description: Nice work with the layering, and love the decorations!
item.content:encoded: Nice work with the layering, and love the decorations!

item.title: By: Angelia McGowan
item.dc:creator: Angelia McGowan
item.description: Those hazelnuts are so darling! I have been looking at everyone's cakes that have done this challenge, and you have the cutest version!
item.content:encoded: Those hazelnuts are so darling! I have been looking at everyone’s cakes that have done this challenge, and you have the cutest version!

item.description: You have such lovely layers in your torte. I think everyone had issues withe caramel layer. :)

item.title: By: isa

item.description: What a gorgeous torte! Beautiful presentation - I love the caramelized halzenuts!
item.content:encoded: What a gorgeous torte! Beautiful presentation – I love the caramelized halzenuts!

item.title: By: Allison
item.dc:creator: Allison
item.description: I love how you created there caramelized whole hazelnuts! They add a special touch to the cake. I wish I had thought of that ;-)
